attributes.review: When getting the app it continues to shut dow. It runs makes my phone super slow. This app need a update on its software. Also when finally starting up after hours it play awful music that continues to give me migraines and nightmares. This is the absolutely worse app do not download.
attributes.title: A absolutely horrible app

attributes.review: this app took THREE WHO YEARS to download.. and as soon as it did, the app burned my house down. i cannot BELIEVE the app🙄. the app burned my house down and it murdered my entire family. this app gave me dehydration , influenced my uncle to join a cult, &now i have to constantly move from state to state.. i’m currently in alabama and have to go to detroit tomorrow.. holy guacamole.. and a white 65 year old lady.. this is UNFAIR.
attributes.title: INFLUENCED UNCLE TO JOIN A CULT

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, a large bird phased through my window and went right into my hair! Every time I opened it again, more birds would keep flying into my hair! I even tried moving location, digging a ditch for myself and hiding in it, but the birds STILL found me! This app is clearly trying to hurt me and I wont stand for this any longer!
attributes.title: Stop the birds!

attributes.review: It’s was the worst experience I have ever had in my life. I don’t recommend every downloading this app. I got so scared when I opened the app because I saw a Cheeto. I was confused why they made a Cheeto the first thing you saw when you opened the app. I was not worried about it but then the app caused me to cry just from existing so I deleted it. I did not like the app AT ALL.
attributes.title: Very bad!!!!!!

attributes.review: so i heard many great things about this app and i was like let me download it real quick so i did. i hate it. i launched it and it was working well then it crashed and i opened it again then it sent me to a link with a virus, it made my phone flash go off driving the lice on my head crazy so they left and now i have no friends then it started making a loud uncomfortable sounds next thing i know there’s a bunch of orange rats in my house so i had to leave my rat infested house and move to china where i now have to inject hand sanitizer and bleach into my blood flow on the daily to avoid corona :(

I’m gonna keep my review short because it hurts to think about what happened, but as I was downloading it my dogs snapped into a trance and just stared at me like this 👁👅👁 and then they both went and jumped on my kitchen table and pooped( they’re both potty trained btw) , and as soon as it finished downloading my dogs both died😭 so do yourselves a favor and DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP‼️
attributes.title: Never download this app

attributes.review: This app took forever to download and it there’s nothing good about it as soon as I opened the app it literally took 1 week to load and then it glitches out my phone and my phone wouldn’t work and I had to get a new one and it broke my AirPods,tablet,computer and all the electronics in my house then made my internet box explode
attributes.title: The worst app ever!!!!!!

attributes.review: This app has destroyed my life it broke my phone and now it is saying I need an impeachment update to fix my phone this is the only reset they’d offer .the app showed disturbing images of an orange person who believed he was God and practiced racism and homophobia this app should be removed from the app store and hidden from children’s eyes due to the graphic content
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.title: DirtySusan👁👄👁
